query.default: select Id, ToName, ToContactName, ContactPhone, FromName, ToZipCode, FromZipCode, ToPlace, FromPlace, EmployeePhone from DirRX_Reports_Envelopes where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId order by Id

query.mssql: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = N'{0}') BEGIN create table {0} ([ReportSessionId] varchar(256), [Id] int NOT NULL, [ToName] nvarchar(max) NULL, [FromName] nvarchar(max) NULL, [ToZipCode] nvarchar(max) NULL, [FromZipCode] nvarchar(max) NULL, [ToPlace] nvarchar(max) NULL, [FromPlace] nvarchar(max) NULL, [EmployeePhone] nvarchar(max) NULL, [ToContactName] nvarchar(max) NULL, [ContactPhone] nvarchar(max) NULL) END
query.postgres: create table if not exists {0} (ReportSessionId citext, Id int NOT NULL, ToName citext NULL, FromName citext NULL, ToZipCode citext NULL, FromZipCode citext NULL, ToPlace citext NULL, FromPlace citext NULL, EmployeePhone citext NULL, ToContactName citext NULL, ContactPhone citext NULL)
